channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Live Updates: Netanyahu Faces Backlash for Firing Israel’s Defense Minister
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s dismissal of Yoav Gallant was seen as a risky step as Israel fights wars on two fronts. Opposition leaders said th...

item.title: Trump Victory Will Signal a Shift in Ukraine War. To What Is Unclear.
item.description: As U.S. president, Donald J. Trump will inherit a role as Ukraine’s chief benefactor. But he has been skeptical about continuing aid to Kyiv.

item.title: Trump 2.0 will have a massive impact on Big Tech, AI, chips and more—in Silicon Valley and beyond
item.description: Predicting Trump remains difficult as ever, but there are clues to what the President-elect might do.

item.title: Flooding in Missouri Kills at Least 5, Including 2 Poll Workers
item.description: The governor activated emergency operations procedures after the deaths this week following days of heavy rainfall, flash flooding and tornadoes.

item.title: What Trump’s win could mean for the three-year Russia-Ukraine conflict
item.description: Trump, who has spoken of his good relations with President Vladimir Putin, has repeatedly said—without elaborating—that he could bring a swift end to ...

item.title: Making sense of the 2024 election results—and what they mean for women
item.description: For the second time, Americans rejected the opportunity to elect the country's first female president and sent Donald Trump to the Oval Office.

item.title: Trump Victory Will Signal a Shift in Ukraine War. To What Is Unclear.
item.description: As U.S. president, Donald J. Trump will inherit a role as Ukraine’s chief benefactor. But he has been skeptical about continuing aid to Kyiv.

item.title: By Firing Gallant, Netanyahu Removes One Threat but Risks Another
item.description: Yoav Gallant, the departing defense minister, opposed Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on key policies. His dismissal has stirred public discontent.

item.title: Trump’s victory speech hails ‘new star’ Elon Musk after tech titan’s billions help him win U.S. election
item.description: The Tesla CEO is a rising force in the Republican Party after playing a pivotal role in helping Donald Trump cruise to victory in Tuesday's election.

item.title: Stocks and the Dollar Jump After Trump Wins Presidential Election
item.description: Bitcoin hit a record, Tesla stock soared and a wide range of markets around the world moved sharply as Donald J. Trump claimed victory.

item.title: What Were Trump’s Policies on Israel In His First Term as President?
item.description: Donald Trump staunchly supported Israel during his first term as president, even when that meant reversing decades of American policy.

item.title: Trump Asked for Power. Voters Said Yes.
item.description: This was a conquering of the nation not by force but with a permission slip. Now, America stands on the precipice of an authoritarian style of governa...

item.title: Trump Wins: Making Sense of Election Night
item.description: An early-morning conversation about the state of the election and the potential consequences of a second term for Donald J. Trump.

item.title: Israeli Officials Embrace Trump Victory, Despite His Unpredictability
item.description: There is a belief in Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s right-wing Israeli government that a Trump administration will allow it to end its wars on fa...

item.title: An events company with 12,000 employees is hoping an ‘overtime savings program’ will boost retention
item.description: The program, aimed at helping frontline workers manage their compensation, helps global events company Encore retain employees during the off-season.
